items.title: Spirit Airlines to cancel all flights to two more US airports, refunds available
items.description: The low-cost airline will run its last flights into two more cities by October 31.

items.title: Jobs report will shed light on how tariffs, other forces affect economy
items.description: The September unemployment report is one of several important economic reports due this week.

items.title: Another big-name gun maker files Chapter 11 bankruptcy
items.description: A number of firearms companies have struggled since the threat of guns being banned, or at least limited in some way, has gone away.
